test.name: As a user I should be albe to see the Device status with timestamp

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
When : user navigates to "Water Card" screen from the "Add New Device Dashboard" screen
Then : user should be displayed with the following Water Leak Detector details:
kw.msg: [PASS] Device Nameis displayed on the WLD Card as Basement
[PASS] Current Temperature of WLD device : 78° Temperature Tab 1 of 2
[PASS] Current Humidity of WLD device : 47.0% Humidity Tab 2 of 2
